NovAge Ultimate Lift Advanced Lifting Day Cream SPF15:

NovAge Ultimate Lift Overnight Lifting & Contouring Cream:

ConceptsCollection.ProductStory:
If loss of firmness and contour definition is ageing your face, it's time to bounce back, with the NovAge Ultimate Lift Skin Care Set, our advanced-performing routine to restore firmness and elasticity for a lifted look with a delightfully youthful bounce.


Powered by patented AspartoLift Technology and Buddleja Plant Stem Cell extract, NovAge Ultimate Lift boosts elastin synthesis and helps to protect the integrity of the skin's extracellular matrix, enhancing the skin's elasticity to help lift, firm and redefine facial contours, as well as smoothing out wrinkles.


70% MORE BOUNCE IN 12 WEEKS∆2 - CLINICALLY PROVEN.

The NovAge Ultimate Lift Skin Care Set of 5 products is designed to follow the NovAge Skin Care Routine. The products are designed to work in harmony to deliver the very best results.


AT LEAST 7X BETTER SKIN WHEN YOU FOLLOW THE NOVAGE ROUTINE - CLINICALLY PROVEN∆1

NovAge Ultimate Lift Advanced Lifting Eye Cream

NovAge Ultimate Lift Lifting Concentrate Serum

NovAge Ultimate Lift Advanced Lifting Day Cream SPF 15

NovAge Ultimate Lift Overnight Lifting & Contouring Cream

ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: Designed to restore skin bounce for a lifted, sculpted look. Advanced performing skin care set created to follow the NovAge Skin Care Routine for optimal results. Cleansing gel, eye cream, serum, day and night creams.
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
THE NOVAGE SKIN CARE ROUTINE – YOUR DAILY FOUNDATION FOR YOUTHFUL, HEALTHY-LOOKING SKIN

STEP 1: CLEANSE - PREPARE TO ABSORB

Over the course of the day, and night, impurities accumulate on the surface of your skin, which makes cleansing vital for the skin's healthy appearance. Cleansing your skin morning and evening also helps create perfect conditions for your skin to absorb the rest of the products in your routine, to deliver the full power of their youth-preserving actives.


1/ Splash your face with warm water.
2/ Dispense one pump of cleansing gel into the palm of your wet hand and massage gently but thoroughly into the damp skin with your fingertips, avoiding the eye area.
3/ Rinse off thoroughly with warm water.
4/ Gently pat the skin dry with a soft towel.

STEP 2: EYES - FOCUS ON THE EYES

Your eyes are the main focus of your face. They also show when you’re tired and are the first place you’re likely to get wrinkles. That’s because the skin around your eyes is much thinner than the rest of your face. Eye creams have lighter textures, are fragrance free and contain just the right amount of active ingredients to target the special needs of the eye area like lines, puffiness and dark circles.


1/ Dispense a controlled pump of eye cream onto the back of your hand. A small bead of cream is sufficient for each eye.
2/ Pick up the cream using your fingertip and dot along your orbital bone.
3/ Pat gently in with the tip of your ring finger until absorbed. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

STEP 3: BOOST - ACTIVATE THE POWER

Packed with actives in a lightweight texture, serums are the booster of your routine, designed to be applied before your day and night creams. The fluid texture of serum is designed to be absorbed and to deliver hydration and actives quickly and efficiently.


1/ Dispense one pump of serum onto the back of your hand.
2/ Pick up product on your fingertips and dot lightly and evenly over your face, avoiding the eye area.
3/ Tap into your skin or sweep gently all over your face until absorbed.

STEP 4: MOISTURISE - REPLENISH & PROTECT

As the thickest products in your routine, your day and night creams provide the final layer of active ingredients together with moisturisation - and they do very different jobs so you need both. The day cream is designed to help protect your skin from daytime aggressors; the night cream is designed to restore, replenish and lock in moisture while you sleep.


1/ Apply just 5 pea-sized dots of cream - on your forehead, each cheek, your nose and chin.
2/ Use your fingertips to gently pat or lightly massage the cream evenly all over your face, avoiding the eye area, until it is fully absorbed.

NOTE: Users of multiple products may find it takes time for the skin to adjust to an intense skin care regime. If so, we recommend introducing products gradually.

NovAge Supreme Cleansing Gel:

NovAge Bright Sublime Advanced Brightening Eye Cream:

NovAge Bright Sublime Advanced Brightening Multi-Action Essence:

Patented Multi-Bright Technology targets and inhibits melanin production in the melanocyte cells. Gardenia Plant Stem Cell extract stimulates collagen synthesis and also protects against its natural degradation. Hydroxy Acid Blend exfoliates away dull, dead skin cells, allowing newer, healthier cells to shine through, and promotes cell turnover and renewal.


NovAge Bright Sublime Advanced Brightening Day Cream SPF 20:

Patented Multi-Bright Technology targets and inhibits melanin production in the melanocyte cells. Gardenia Plant Stem Cell extract stimulates collagen synthesis and also protects against its natural degradation to promote a healthy skin structure. UVA and UVB Filters provide protection from solar radiation.


NovAge Bright Sublime Advanced Brightening Night Cream:

Patented Multi-Bright Technology targets and inhibits melanin production in the melanocyte cells. Potent antioxidant Gingko Flavonoids help scavenge and suppress melanin-inducing free radicals.

The NovAge Bright Sublime Set of five products is designed to follow the NovAge Skin Care Routine. The products are designed to work in harmony to deliver the very best results.


BEST RESULTS WHEN YOU FOLLOW THE NOVAGE ROUTINE - CLINICALLY PROVEN∆2

ConceptsCollection.ProductStory:
Cleansing Brush Heads for the SkinPro Sonic 3-in-1 System

Set of 2 replacement Cleansing Brush Heads.

Effective everyday cleansing for exceptionally clean, fresh, visibly rejuvenated and healthy-looking skin.


BETTER THAN MANUAL CLEANSING - CLINICALLY PROVEN!∆


The fine nylon bristles of the cleansing brush are designed to remove make-up and everyday impurities including excess oil and sebum, dirt and other impurities like pollution particles, to leave the skin prepared for optimal absorption of your skin care products.


The brush head should be replaced every 3 months for the best results.


Size: Diameter 4.77 cm. Materials: PP with nylon bristles.


∆ Clinically tested using all three heads in combination with a foaming cleanser and a basic moisturiser.
ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: Pack of 2 replacement Brush Heads for the SkinPro Sonic 3-in-1 System. Effective everyday cleansing for clean, fresh, visibly rejuvenated and healthy-looking skin. Leave the skin prepared for optimal absorption of your skin care products. Clinically proven results.
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
Purifying BRUSH CLEANSING HEAD

Use daily. We recommend the 60-second Automated Facial Zone Programme.


  • Gently remove eye make-up by hand using eye make-up remover. Do not use the device around the delicate eye area.

  • Moisten your face and the cleansing brush with warm water.
  • Apply a little facial cleanser onto your skin, or directly onto the brush. Do not use cleansers which contain exfoliating particles.
  • Switch on device and select the programme of your choice.
  • Press the brush gently against your skin and move in small circular motions. Avoid the eye area. You will feel light vibration.
  • When the programme is complete, rinse your face with clean, warm water and gently pat your skin dry with a soft towel.
  • Rinse the brush thoroughly and allow to dry naturally.


For detailed information on product use, safety and maintenance please read the leaflet supplied with the device.

The floral heart of tuberose and violet is coloured by juicy, acidulous red berry notes of the glossy raspberry, before descending in the refined warmth of patchouli, tonka bean and vanilla.

What scent can be more irresistible than glossy raspberry! The ONE Disguise Eau de Parfum is created around the juicy, colourful and acidulous fragrance of the raspberry. ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: Advanced performing skin care set powered by patented Tri-Peptide Technology and Solanaceae Plant Stem Cell extract. Visibly corrects wrinkles and refines skin tone and texture for smooth, radiant, resilient skin. Cleansing gel, eye cream, serum and day and night creams.
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
THE NOVAGE SKIN CARE ROUTINE – YOUR DAILY REGIMEN FOR YOUTHFUL, HEALTHY-LOOKING SKIN

STEP 1: CLEANSE - PREPARE TO ABSORB

Over the course of the day, and night, impurities accumulate on the surface of your skin, which makes cleansing vital for the skin's healthy appearance. Cleansing your skin morning and evening also helps create perfect conditions for your skin to absorb the rest of the products in your routine, to deliver the full power of their youth-preserving actives.


1/ Splash your face with warm water.
2/ Dispense one pump of cleansing gel into the palm of your wet hand and massage gently but thoroughly into the damp skin with your fingertips, avoiding the eye area.
3/ Rinse off thoroughly with warm water.
4/ Gently pat the skin dry with a soft towel.

STEP 2: EYES - FOCUS ON THE EYES

Your eyes are the main focus of your face. They also show when you’re tired and are the first place you’re likely to get wrinkles. That’s because the skin around your eyes is much thinner than the rest of your face. Eye creams have lighter textures, are fragrance free and contain just the right amount of active ingredients to target the special needs of the eye area like lines, puffiness and dark circles.


1/ Squeeze the tube to dispense the cream onto the roller ball applicator. A small bead of cream is sufficient for each eye.
2/ Roll the applicator ball back and forth along the lower orbital bone, starting at the outer corner. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.
3/ Finish by patting cream in with your fingertip until absorbed.

STEP 3: BOOST - ACTIVATE THE POWER

Packed with actives in a lightweight texture, serums are the booster of your routine, designed to be applied before your day and night creams. The fluid texture of serum is designed to be absorbed and to deliver hydration and actives quickly and efficiently.


1/ Dispense one pump of serum onto the back of your hand.
2/ Pick up product on your fingertips and dot lightly and evenly over your face, avoiding the eye area.
3/ Tap into your skin or sweep gently all over your face until absorbed.

STEP 4: MOISTURISE - REPLENISH & PROTECT

As the thickest products in your routine, your day and night creams provide the final layer of active ingredients together with moisturisation - and they do very different jobs so you need both. The day cream is designed to help protect your skin from daytime aggressors; the night cream is designed to restore, replenish and lock in moisture while you sleep.


1/ Apply just 5 pea-sized dots of cream - on your forehead, each cheek, your nose and chin.
2/ Use your fingertips to gently pat or lightly massage the cream evenly all over your face, avoiding the eye area, until it is fully absorbed.

NOTE: Users of multiple products may find it takes time for the skin to adjust to an intense skin care regime. If so, we recommend introducing products gradually.

ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: 3-in-1 facial care system with sonic technology for cleaner, more radiant, younger-looking skin. Convenient battery-operated device with choice of three attachments; cleansing brush, exfoliating head and massage head. Three programmes including automated 60-seconds. Takes 2 x AA batteries (not included).
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
VIBRATE YOUR WAY TO CLEANER, MORE RADIANT, YOUNGER-LOOKING SKIN!
DAILY: purifying Brush Cleansing Head + your usual cleanser
1-2X WEEKLY (non-consecutive days): skin-refining Silicone Exfoliating Head + your usual cleanser
DAILY: toning Metal Massage Head + your usual moisturisers

Purifying BRUSH CLEANSING HEAD

Use daily. We recommend the 60-second Automated Facial Zone Programme.


  • Gently remove eye make-up by hand using eye make-up remover. Do not use the device around the delicate eye area.
  • Moisten your face and the cleansing brush with warm water.
  • Apply a little facial cleanser onto your skin, or directly onto the brush. Do not use cleansers which contain exfoliating particles.
  • Switch on device and select the programme of your choice.
  • Press the brush gently against your skin and move in small circular motions. Avoid the eye area. You will feel light vibration.
  • When the programme is complete, rinse your face with clean, warm water and gently pat your skin dry with a soft towel.
  • Rinse the brush thoroughly and allow to dry naturally.

Skin-refining SILICONE EXFOLIATING HEAD

Use once or twice a week (non-consecutive days) after cleansing. We recommend the 60-second Automated Facial Zone Programme.


  • Gently remove eye make-up by hand with eye make-up remover. Do not use the device around the delicate eye area.
  • Moisten your face and the silicone exfoliating head with warm water.
  • Apply a little facial cleanser onto your skin, or directly onto the exfoliating head. Do not use cleansers which contain exfoliating particles.
  • Switch on and select the programme of your choice.
  • Press the silicone head gently against your skin and move in small circular motions. Avoid the eye area. You will feel light vibration.
  • When the programme is complete, rinse your face with clean, warm water and gently pat your skin dry with a soft towel.
  • Rinse the exfoliating head thoroughly and allow to dry naturally.

Toning METAL MASSAGE HEAD

Use as often as you wish. For the best results use daily on clean skin. Suitable for the face, jawline, neck and décolletage. Avoid the eye area, bridge of the nose, chin and Adam's apple.


  • Apply your usual moisturiser and allow to absorb.
  • Switch on and select the programme of your choice.
  • Gently press the massage head against your skin and move in small circular motions. Avoid the eye area. You will feel light vibration.
  • When the programme is complete, wipe any residual moisturiser from the massage head with a damp cloth.

PROGRAMME 1: 60-SECOND AUTOMATED FACIAL ZONE PROGRAMME

A perfect choice especially when you first start using the device!

The 60-second Automated Facial Zone Programme is designed to time your facial cleansing and exfoliation - forehead 20 seconds, nose, upper lip and chin 20 seconds in total, cheeks 10 seconds each. Operation pauses briefly between zones and switches off automatically when the programme is complete.


PROGRAMME 2: CONTINUOUS HIGH INTENSITY

Select this programme for a more intense action. Not recommended for sensitive, irritated, thin or damaged skin.


PROGRAMME 3: CONTINUOUS LOW INTENSITY

Select this programme for a longer, less intense action.


CARING FOR YOUR SKINPRO SONIC 3-in-1 SYSTEM

Caring for your SkinPro Sonic is important to keep it looking beautiful and in good working condition.


For detailed information on product use, safety and maintenance please read the leaflet that comes in the box.

ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
Apply to a clean face, avoiding direct contact with the eyes.


Always begin at the centre of the face and work outwards, taking care to blend along the hairline and jawline.


Apply lightly - you can always apply a little more to target areas if required.


The ONE BB Cream can be applied with fingers, cosmetic sponge or foundation brush:


Fingers - dot onto the skin and pat lightly into the skin to an even finish.


Sponge - dot onto the skin with your finger and pat into the skin with the sponge to an even finish.


Brush - use the brush to pick up a little cream from the back of your hand and work into the skin using small, fast strokes.

ConceptsCollection.ActiveIngredients:
Formulated with Swedish natural ingredient blend of Blueberry and Cloudberry together with Vitamins C & E.


Blueberry is super-charged with antioxidants, which help protect the skin against damaging free radicals. Blueberries are also packed with sugars which help hydrate the skin.

Cloudberry, a subarctic wild berry, is renowned for its high levels of skin-loving nutrients. Cloudberry extract is rich in Vitamin C, which helps to boost skin radiance and protect against free radical damage.

Vitamin C offers many benefits for healthy skin. A powerful antioxidant, Vitamin C helps to neutralise skin damaging free radicals. It also helps to inhibit melanin production, for a brighter, more radiant complexion.

Vitamin E helps protect against free radical damage and helps hydrate the skin by enhancing the ability of the skin to retain moisture.

ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: Cleansing gel designed to create perfect skin conditions to absorb following serum and moisturisers. Gently cleanses impurities including make-up without stripping the skin barrier and hydrates to leave skin feeling clean, toned, soft, supple and comfortable. Rinseable formula with cleansing, moisturising and soothing technologies. Clinically, consumer and dermatologically tested.
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
Cleanse every morning and evening as the first step of your skin care routine.


1: Remove eye make-up with eye make-up remover.
2: Splash the face and neck with water.
3: Dispense one pump of cleansing gel into wet hands and rub them together to distribute the gel.
4: Massage all over the damp skin of the face and neck with the fingertips, avoiding the eye area.
5: Rinse off thoroughly with clean, warm water and gently pat the skin dry with a soft towel.
6: Repeat the process if desired.


The importance of good cleansing

The importance of good cleansing morning and evening cannot be underestimated. Many different impurities accumulate on the skin both day and night - from the environment, from the skin's natural biological processes, and from the products we apply. Not necessarily visible to the eye, these impurities can form a layer of grease, dirt and dead skin cells, which can clog pores and make it difficult for your products to be optimally absorbed. Effectively removing this layer of impurities, without disrupting the skin barrier, and adding hydration, creates optimum conditions for the absorption of the following serum and moisturisers.


Why you need to cleanse AM & PM

Undesirable impurities accumulate on the surface of the skin around the clock, and can clog the pores. For example:

PM: dust, dirt, pollution particles, sweat, excess oil & sebum, sunscreen residues and make-up.

AM: dead skin cells, cellular debris from the skin's natural biological processes, sweat and excess oil & sebum.


Optimal and healthy conditions to absorb your NovAge serum and moisturisers:
  • Clean
  • Hydrated
  • Preserved skin barrier

ConceptsCollection.ActiveIngredients:
Powered by Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamins C & E and Niacinamide (Vitamin B3).


Hyaluronic Acid is a powerful hydrator which can hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water. It binds and retains moisture in the upper layers of the epidermis for intense hydration.

Vitamins C and E both offer excellent antioxidant properties, helping to protect against free radical damage. Vitamin C also helps to inhibit melanin production and is reported to stimulate collagen production, while Vitamin E helps to boost hydration.

Niacinamide offers many well documented benefits including the reinforcement and maintenance of a strong, healthy skin barrier.

ConceptsCollection.ActiveIngredients:
Skin Cell Turnover

Skin cell turnover is the continuous, natural cycle whereby skin cells are produced, move to the outermost layer of the epidermis, die and are shed (desquamation) to reveal the healthy cells beneath. As we age, not only does the rate of this process slow down, but the natural ability of the skin to shed the dead cells is diminished, resulting in an accumulation of superficial cells on the surface of the skin. The NovAge Advanced Skin Renewing Treatment aids the desquamation process for brighter, smoother, more refined skin with less visible imperfections.


Step 1: Intensive peeling solution powered by Glycolic & Lactic Acids. Step 2: Neutralising Solution infused with HydrActive.

Glycolic Acid & Lactid Acid

Glycolic Acid and Lactic Acid are alpha hydroxy acids (AHA). They promote exfoliation of corneocytes - the outermost layer of skin cells in the epidermis - by breaking down the physical bonds between them. Exfoliation of these dead, superficial allows the newer, healthier cells beneath to shine through.


HydrActive

HydrActive bathes the skin in essential hydration, by helping to hold and retain moisture in the uppermost layers of the skin. It improves the skin's water holding capacity, helping to plump, soften and enhance radiance. Together with the rest of the formulation, it will neutralise the peeling process and rebalance the skin's pH level.

STEP 2: EYES - FOCUS ON THE EYES

Your eyes are the main focus of your face. They also show when you’re tired and are the first place you’re likely to get wrinkles. That’s because the skin around your eyes is much thinner than the rest of your face. Eye creams have lighter textures, are fragrance free and contain just the right amount of active ingredients to target the special needs of the eye area like lines, puffiness and dark circles.


1/ Dispense a controlled pump of eye cream onto the back of your hand. A small bead of cream is sufficient for each eye.
2/ Pick up the cream using your fingertip and dot along your orbital bone.
3/ Pat gently in with the tip of your ring finger until absorbed. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

Hero note story:

To fully express the world of temptation and the taste for things which are forbidden, our perfumer was immediately attracted to the thrilling appearance and seductive smell of glossy honey for this fragrance. For her, it perfectly symbolises the sensuality of the flesh, and the lavish indulgence of girls who are confident of breaking the rules for personal pleasure.

ConceptsCollection.ProductStory:
PAINT. PEEL. REPEAT.

YOUR EASY MANI MAKEOVER


Peel your way from one look to the next as often as you change your outfit with The ONE Peel-Off Base Coat.


It forms a beautifully smooth, clear, protective base for your nail polish, and when you’re ready for a change it peels cleanly and satisfyingly away - even extreme colours and stubborn glitter gone without a trace! No mess, no fuss, and helps to protect against staining for fabulous nails that match your mood, your style, your day. Manicures have never been easier!
ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: Peelable base coat for easy nail polish removal. Forms a smooth, clear base for your manicure. All types of polish including strong colours and glitter peel clean away. Helps protect nails against staining. Wide brush for easy application.
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
STEP 1: BASE

Apply a generous coat onto clean nails. Allow to dry thoroughly before applying nail polish.


STEP 2: COLOUR

Paint on one or more coats of your favourite nail colour, allowing to dry thoroughly between coats.


STEP 3: PEEL

Simply push up the edge of your polish at the side of the nail, then peel away.



TOP TIP: Soaking your fingers in warm water for a few minutes can assist easy removal.

Contains Purifying & Exfoliating Cleanser, Eye Rescue Gel, Energising & Hydrating Booster and Intense Anti-ageing Face Gel Lotion. Designed for use as a simple, but powerful routine that takes less than 2 minutes to perform, every morning and evening.


When used as a routine, the range delivers a clinically proven Anti-Fatigue Effect:

  • Wrinkle reduction†3
  • Skin smoothness improvement†3
  • Improvement in skin hydration†2
  • Improvement in skin flexibility†3
  • Improvement in skin tonicity†3

Individually, men have agreed the following superb results in consumer testing:


  • Purifying & Exfoliating Cleanser: skin is left oil and sebum free instantly – 94% agree*
  • Eye Rescue Gel: men say it looks like they’ve had a full night's sleep – 78% agree*
  • Hydrating Booster: skin looks rested and fresh – 94% agree*
  • Intense Anti-ageing Face Gel Lotion: visibly reduces all signs of ageing – 78% agree*

* Consumer tested on male skin.

†2 Clinical test using NovAge Men Set

†3 Expert clinical evaluation using NovAge Men Set
ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: Engineered specifically for male skin to fight signs of ageing and tiredness. Skin is left feeling energised, fresher, smoother and younger looking. Used as a routine, clinically proven to achieve an Anti-Fatigue Effect, resulting in reduced wrinkles and improvements in skin smoothness, hydration, flexibility and tonicity. Contains cleanser, eye cream, serum and lotion. Apply every morning and evening.
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse:
Purifying & Exfoliating Cleanser: Apply to the face and neck, gently massaging with fingertips. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

Eye Rescue Gel: Gently squeeze tube and roll over cleansed skin approximately 0.5 cm below each eye. Use morning and evening. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Hydrating Booster: Massage into cleansed skin morning and evening, avoiding the eye area.

Intense Anti-ageing Face Gel Lotion: Massage into cleansed skin morning and evening, avoiding the eye area.

Oriflame's The ONE invites you to take your favourite 5-in-1 lash look to an all new level with The ONE Wonder Lash XXL Mascara. Discover the power of Oriflame's exclusive Wonder Brush with patented Dual Core Technology. It empowers the Wonder Lash Pro Lash formula with an explosive boost of multi-benefit impact and exceptional volume.


The brush's firm inner core and outer core of soft, dense bristles work together to drench your lashes in the coconut oil infused Pro Lash Formulation and deliver 33%† more volume, while pushing lashes upwards for exceptional curl* and length*.


Discover what it feels like to embrace the ultimate, lash by lash, and unleash the extraordinary in you.


† Clinically Tested

* Consumer Tested
ConceptsCollection.ProductDescription: The ONE 5-in-1 Wonder Lash XXL Mascara Waterproof delivers exceptional impact, intensity and 33%<superscript>†</superscript> more volume to your favourite 5-in-1 lash look. Oriflame's exclusive Wonder Brush with patented Dual Core Technology is the exciting new innovation that gives you all the goodness of the 5-in-1 multi-benefit formula you know and love in an extraordinary, new amplified lash look.
ConceptsCollection.HowToUse: Use the Exclusive-to-Oriflame Wonder Brush with patented Dual Core Technology to overload your lashes with Wonder Lash XXL's formulation and sculpt your amplified lash look. First, overload your lashes with the curved side of brush using the reservoir zone for enhanced formula application. Then, build exceptional length with the flat side of brush using the fluffy zone's long and short bristles.

ConceptsCollection.ActiveIngredients:
Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Skin Perfector Complex, White Tea Extract and Micro Pearls.


Skin Perfector Complex
- Cell function enhancer - For a more radiant, dewy complexion

Skin Perfector Complex encourages the production of proteins that promote a healthy skin cell life cycle. This in turn helps to make skin more beautiful and radiant in appearance, and helps to slow factors that contribute to the skin ageing process.


White Tea Extract (Camellia sinensis)

- Antioxidant with stimulant properties - Enhances skin's natural appearance and radiance

White Tea contains caffeine, which helps to stimulate and invigorate the skin, and is blessed with antioxidant properties which help protect skin from damaging external aggressors, which can make it look dull and lacklustre.


Hyaluronic Acid

- Intensively hydrating - Encourages plump, fresh-looking skin

This supreme hydrator is able to hold up to 1,000 times its weight in water. Like a sponge, it helps to draw moisture from the deeper layers of the skin and retains it in the uppermost layers.


Micro Pearls

- Illuminating - For a radiant, healthy appearance

Layered mica cosmetic pearls in complementary hues of gold and rose subtly reflect the light, creating a youthful, rosy luminosity, which enhances the overall beauty of the skin.

ConceptsCollection.ActiveIngredients:
Follow a trail through a dewy garden with Sensual Jasmine EdT. The top notes are clean and fresh, with sparkling lily of the valley, the crisp scent of green buds and a zesty bergamot facet. But the scent that captivates is Jasmine, the queen of flowers, on a pedestal at the heart, its radiant beauty enhanced by tender orange blossom and the comforting delicacy of mimosa. The scent of Jasmine lingers and grows in intensity, lifted up to a sensual crescendo by the creamy warmth of white musk and sandalwood and the gourmand intrigue of tonka bean.


Hero fragrance note: Jasmine.

Jasmine is one of the most iconic and noble flowers in perfumery, revered for its dainty blooms and its unique and enigmatic scent. The perfect expression of sensual femininity and grace.


Key Fragrance notes: Lily of the Valley, Jasmine, White Musk

Top: Bergamot Oil, Lily of the Valley, Spring Buds
Heart: Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Mimosa
Base: White Musk, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean

ConceptsCollection.ProductStory:
DELIGHT IN THE SENSUAL GRACE OF JASMINE

Stroll through the grass to the place where the snow-white jasmine climbs wild and graceful. Close your eyes, surrender to the subtle, sensual fragrance and feel your affinity with nature flourish.


Sensual Jasmine Eau de Toilette celebrates the grace and magnificence of Jasmine. The exquisite scent of Jasmine radiates brightly from its pedestal at the heart of the fragrance, with a supporting chorus of dainty white florals and a subtle hint of white musk.
